snippet: The California drought has taken a large toll on Jim Ouimet and his mushing company, Mammoth Dog Teams, which thrives on snow.
abstract: California drought has taken a large toll on Jim Ouimet and his mushing company, Mammoth Dog Teams, which offers sled-dog tours that depend on snowfall; recent years have seen less and less snow on peaks of the Eastern Sierras near Mammoth Lakes, where business is located.
lead_paragraph: The California drought has taken a large toll on Jim Ouimet and his mushing company, Mammoth Dog Teams, which thrives on snow.

headline.main: Photos: With Little Snow and Little Work, a Musher Worries
headline.print_headline: With Little Snow and No Work, a Musher Worries
